Why now, we neet chose Trustbit Exchange: Crypto assets are becoming increasingly popular and accessible, creating an ideal opportunity for disruption in the Web3 space. An exchange will be the lead product to get mass adoptions

The current CEX industry lacks efficient, secure and reliable platforms for users to trade and exchange crypto assets.

Decentralized exchanges can provide users with greater control over their funds and security, transparency.

The potential to scale and expand the decentralized perpetual crypto exchange space is immense.
